Sex Issue 2018

Sex on Campus

The Daily Californian is collecting stories about sexual encounters on campus.

By Ian MacGregor
FEB. 14, 2018

We've all heard the stories, but where does it actually happen? For our special issue on sex, The Daily Californian is collecting stories to examine where sexual encounters on campus actually happen and what they actually look like.

If you feel comfortable, please share a time you had a sexual encounter on campus, where it happened and how it made you feel. We want to provide a safe and anonymous space where you can feel comfortable sharing your own story, however intense, funny, casual, uncomfortable or haunting it may be.

Thank you for your response. It will be reviewed and added to the map.

Tell us about a sexual encounter you've had on Berkeley's campus.

Responses may be edited for clarity and length.

If you're comfortable with the Daily Cal reaching out to you, please leave your name and contact information here.

I’d like to give a special thanks to Avni and Emily for their work on the “Where We Cry” project, upon which this project is heavily based.

Questions, comments or corrections? Email projects@dailycal.org.
